text.div: StructureDefinition for DocumentReference Resource in the Find Document References (ITI-67) transaction between the MHD Document Responder and the MHD Document Consumer with Minimal metadata compliance in the IHE IT Infrastructure Technical Framework Supplement Mobile access to Health Documents (MHD) Rev. 3.1. The IHE MHD Profile text is Normative, this conformance resource is Informative.

title.value: IHE MHD Profile on DocumentReference (DocumentEntry) from a Query with Minimal Metadata, see Table 3:4.3.2.1-3.

description.value: Profile on DocumentReference based on IHE IT Infrastructure Technical Framework Supplement - Mobile access to Health Documents (MHD) Rev. 3.1. See http://wiki.ihe.net/index.php/Mobile_access_to_Health_Documents_(MHD) The IHE MHD Profile text is Normative, this conformance resource is Informative.
